title: Send Discord announcement as single message with text + image
author: Itachi-1824

gist.summary: Refactors the Discord announcement script to bundle text and images into a single multipart request.
gist.impact: Improves the reliability and presentation of automated PR announcements in the community server.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the Pollinations bee mascot neatly packing a letter and a photo into a single envelope. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Pixel text 'delivery'. Nostalgic but beautiful.
